00160 template <class MenuType>
00161 void CSimpleMainWindowGuiComp::CreateMenu(const iqtgui::CHierarchicalCommand& command, MenuType& result) const
00162 {
00163        int prevGroupId = ibase::ICommand::GI_NONE;
00164 
00165        int childsCount = command.GetChildsCount();
00166 
00167        QMap<int, QActionGroup*> groups;
00168 
00169        for (int i = 0; i < childsCount; ++i){
00170               QString text = command.text();
00171               iqtgui::CHierarchicalCommand* hierarchicalPtr = const_cast<iqtgui::CHierarchicalCommand*>(
00172                                    dynamic_cast<const iqtgui::CHierarchicalCommand*>(command.GetChild(i)));
00173 
00174               if (hierarchicalPtr != NULL){
00175                      QString text2 = hierarchicalPtr->text();
00176                      int groupId = hierarchicalPtr->GetGroupId();
00177                      int flags = hierarchicalPtr->GetStaticFlags();
00178 
00179                      if ((groupId != prevGroupId) && (prevGroupId != ibase::ICommand::GI_NONE)){
00180                             result.addSeparator();
00181                      }
00182 
00183                      if (groupId != ibase::ICommand::GI_NONE){
00184                             prevGroupId = groupId;
00185                      }
00186 
00187                      if (hierarchicalPtr->GetChildsCount() > 0){
00188                             QMenu* newMenuPtr = new QMenu(&result);
00189                             newMenuPtr->setTitle(hierarchicalPtr->GetName());
00190 
00191                             CreateMenu<QMenu>(*hierarchicalPtr, *newMenuPtr);
00192 
00193                             result.addMenu(newMenuPtr);
00194                      }
00195                      else if ((flags & ibase::ICommand::CF_GLOBAL_MENU) != 0){
00196                             if ((flags & ibase::ICommand::CF_EXCLUSIVE) != 0){
00197                                    QActionGroup*& groupPtr = groups[hierarchicalPtr->GetGroupId()];
00198                                    if (groupPtr == NULL){
00199                                           groupPtr = new QActionGroup(&result);
00200                                           groupPtr->setExclusive(true);
00201                                    }
00202 
00203                                    groupPtr->addAction(hierarchicalPtr);
00204                                    hierarchicalPtr->setCheckable(true);
00205                             }
00206 
00207                             result.addAction(hierarchicalPtr);
00208                      }
00209               }
00210        }
00211 }
